SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreWhere] ( [CoreWhere_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreWhere_Title] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEntities_Ky] int NULL , [CoreAttributes_Ky] int NOT NULL , [CoreWhere_Order] int NULL , [CoreWhere_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreWhere_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreWhere_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreWhere_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreWhere_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreWhere_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreWhere] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreWhere PRIMARY KEY ([CoreWhere_Ky])
